    @then(parsers.parse('check {light_name} status is {action} at {check_time}'))
    def check_light_status(target, light_name, action, check_time):
        now_time = datetime.datetime.now()
        now_date = datetime.datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d')
        check_time = now_date + ' ' + check_time
        check_time = datetime.datetime.strptime(check_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M')
        logger.info("now time is " + str(now_time))
        logger.info(light_name + " schedule will be active at " + str(check_time))
        wait_seconds = (check_time - now_time).seconds + 60
        wait_minutes = wait_seconds / 60
        logger.info("wait " + format(wait_minutes, '.3f') + " minutes util schedule takes effect")
        time.sleep(wait_seconds)
    
        # check the status from light

        response = target.udp.get_pilot_phone(light_name)
